title: Landing Page
description: Create GeoHints-specific landing page with category cards and hero section. See .kiro/specs/02-landing-page/

title: Text Analyzer
description: Reverse lookup feature: paste text to identify possible countries based on character analysis. See .kiro/specs/04-text-analyzer/

title: Adopt Tailwind CSS v4 Modern Features
description: Ensure we're using Tailwind v4 idiomatically with CSS-first configuration, modern utilities, and zero-config content detection. Remove all v3 legacy patterns.

title: Migrate to CSS-first @theme configuration
description: Move any remaining JS-based theme config to CSS @theme directive. Define colors, fonts, breakpoints in global.css using CSS variables.

title: Remove tailwind.config.cjs if unused
description: Tailwind v4 uses CSS-first config. Audit tailwind.config.cjs - if only defining content paths (now auto-detected), delete it entirely.

title: Adopt container queries where appropriate
description: Replace viewport-based responsive utilities with @container queries for component-level responsiveness. Use @lg:, @md: etc for container-aware layouts.

title: Use modern utility syntax (text-shadow, masks, composable variants)
description: Leverage new v4 utilities: text-shadow-*, mask-*, not-* variants, and composable variant chains like group-has-focus:opacity-100.

title: Update important modifier syntax (!flex â†’ flex!)
description: V4 changed important modifier position. Find and replace all !utility patterns with utility! syntax.

title: Adopt TypeScript 5.9 Modern Features
description: Leverage TypeScript 5.8-5.9 features: import defer, erasableSyntaxOnly compatibility, modern tsconfig defaults. Ensure code is future-proof.

title: Adopt Vite 7 Modern Features
description: Leverage Vite 7's new capabilities: baseline browser targets, CSS preprocessor workers, and prepare for Rolldown integration. Remove deprecated patterns.

title: Evaluate Rolldown for faster builds
description: Test rolldown-vite as a drop-in replacement. Compare build times. Document any compatibility issues before considering adoption.

title: Configure css.preprocessorMaxWorkers for parallel CSS
description: Ensure css.preprocessorMaxWorkers is enabled (now default true). Verify parallel Sass/PostCSS processing is active.

title: Use hook filters in custom Vite plugins
description: If we have custom Vite plugins, add filter patterns to load/transform hooks to reduce overhead. E.g., filter: { include: /\.svg$/ }

title: Remove splitVendorChunkPlugin usage
description: splitVendorChunkPlugin was removed in Vite 7. Migrate to build.rollupOptions.output.manualChunks or Rolldown's advancedChunks API.

title: Language Search & Filter
description: Add search/filter functionality to language pages for quick character/country lookup. See .kiro/specs/03-language-search-filter/

title: Adopt Qwik 1.18 Modern Features
description: Leverage Qwik's new automatic bundle preloading, externalized QwikLoader, and rewrite() function. Ensure optimal resumability patterns.

title: Configure preload options in entry.ssr.ts
description: Configure new automatic bundle preloading with SSR options: preloadProbability, maxIdlePreloads, debug. Tune for optimal performance.

title: Use rewrite() for internal routing
description: Replace redirect patterns with rewrite() where appropriate. Enables internal rewrites without URL changes - useful for slug-based routing.

title: Import build constants from @builder.io/qwik
description: Update imports: use isDev, isBrowser, isServer from '@builder.io/qwik' instead of '@builder.io/qwik/build'.

title: Remove service worker prefetch configuration
description: Service workers for prefetching are deprecated. Remove any SW-based prefetch config - Qwik now uses native modulepreload.

title: Foundation & Cleanup
description: Clean up starter cruft, extract shared utilities, externalize data, fix TypeScript issues, update branding. See .kiro/specs/01-foundation-cleanup/

title: Remove demo pages and unused components
description: Delete /demo/flower, /demo/todolist, and unused starter components (counter, gauge, infobox, next-steps, hero). Delete thunder.png.

title: Update Footer
description: Remove Builder.io attribution. Add GeoHints-appropriate footer content.

title: Final verification for foundation cleanup
description: Run pnpm build, pnpm lint. Test all routes manually. Verify no console errors. Update README.md.

title: Reorganize component structure
description: Create src/components/layout/, ui/, features/ directories. Move header/footer to layout/. Flatten component structure.

title: Create shared utilities
description: Create src/lib/ with utils.ts (getFlagEmoji, getCountryName) and types.ts (CountryCode, CharacterEntry, LanguageRegion). Remove duplicate functions from language pages.

title: Externalize language data
description: Create src/data/languages/ with europe-northern.ts and europe-central-eastern.ts. Extract inline char data from routes. Create index.ts that exports all regions.

title: Create shared CharacterGrid component
description: Extract grid rendering logic from language pages into src/components/features/CharacterGrid.tsx. Update both language pages to use shared component.

title: Fix TypeScript issues
description: Fix numImages: Number -> number in follow/index.tsx. Run pnpm build.types and fix any errors.

title: Update routing to use Link component
description: Replace <a href> with <Link> from @builder.io/qwik-city for all internal navigation in Header and route pages.

title: Clean up CSS
description: Remove duplicate html/body rules in global.css. Consolidate font-family definitions. Clean up styles.css comments.

title: Update branding and meta
description: Update package.json name to geohints. Create logo SVG and favicon. Update Header to use new logo. Add DocumentHead meta tags. Create OG image.
